title: Intensive Short-Term Course Based on Cognitive Apprenticeship Model for Online Journalism Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment course for advanced learners adapted to online environments post-COVID-19, conducted in limited-but-practical smartphone-centric technical settings

learning_goals: Learners can develop online journalism article proposals based on scientific issues.
Learners can apply article draft revision strategies through peer feedback and expert modeling.
Learners can produce and share final deliverables of science journalism projects using digital tools within an LMS.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
